# Exercises

## Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(patchwork)
data_folder <- "~/github/islr2/data/"
```

## Exercise 8

### Problem (b)

```{r}
tbl <- 
  read_csv(paste(data_folder, "College.csv", sep = "")) %>%
  rename(Rownames = "...1")
tbl
```

### Problem (c)

```{r}
summary(tbl)
```

```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=10}
ggpairs(tbl, columns = 3:10, lower = list(continuous = "smooth"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = tbl) +
  geom_boxplot(mapping = aes(x = Private, y = Outstate))
```

```{r}
tbl <- tbl %>% mutate(Elite = if_else(Top10perc > 50, "Yes", "No"))
tbl
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = tbl) +
  geom_boxplot(mapping = aes(x = Elite, y = Outstate))
```

```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=10}
plots <- list()
for (i in 3:18) {
  var <- sym(colnames(tbl)[i])
  plots[[paste("column", i)]] <- ggplot(tbl) +
    geom_histogram(aes(!!var)) +
    labs(y = NULL)
}
wrap_plots(plots)
```
